name: CASIO LK-280 Premium Lighted USB Keyboard Pack with Power Supply, Keyboard Stand and Closed-Cup Stereo Headphones

reviews.name: CASIO LK-280 Premium Lighted USB Keyboard Pack with Power Supply, Keyboard Stand and Closed-Cup Stereo Headphones
reviews.reviewText:
I bought this to teach myself to play.

Using a combination of Youtube, programs like Synthesia, the built in sd card reading midi file.

If your using your computer with the usb, I suggest using: Synthesia (free version).

Lighting works with computer.

Great keyboard. For $150, this was a great deal (CASIO LK-280 Premium Lighted USB Keyboard Pack with Power Supply, Keyboard Stand and Closed-Cup Stereo Headphones).
reviews.title: Great keyboard all around!

reviews.name: CASIO LK-280 Premium Lighted USB Keyboard Pack with Power Supply, Keyboard Stand and Closed-Cup Stereo Headphones
reviews.reviewText: I bought this for my daughter who is ten years old. We have only had it for a few weeks but it seems to be working out. She just started piano lessons and I didn't want to invest in a piano if she wasn't serious about the new hobby. She is enjoying it. I found the directions a little complicated. It does a lot of stuff, but I might be just too old too figure it out. Younger minds seem to do better with the technology stuff.
reviews.title: BEGINNING PIANO

reviews.name: CASIO LK-280 Premium Lighted USB Keyboard Pack with Power Supply, Keyboard Stand and Closed-Cup Stereo Headphones
reviews.reviewText: Purchased for our 9 year old daughter who also plays the piano. She loves to practice on this and enjoys the many different sounds it makes. She's learning to follow the 'light up' keys to learn new songs too. Great to have the headphones so she can play without disturbing others in the room. Good quality on the stand and keyboard. Lightweight so can easily be moved/carried. Glad we purchased this at a good price.
reviews.title: Nice keyboard

reviews.name: CASIO LK-280 Premium Lighted USB Keyboard Pack with Power Supply, Keyboard Stand and Closed-Cup Stereo Headphones
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this for my grand daughter for Christmas , on line out of state n then drove to her place 15 hours away n I saw her open the package , it was shipped very nice n protected by packaging , I would recommend this as an excellent product ! I was very pleased ! And its of high quality !
reviews.title: Great keyboard for someone just starting out

reviews.name: CASIO LK-280 Premium Lighted USB Keyboard Pack with Power Supply, Keyboard Stand and Closed-Cup Stereo Headphones
reviews.reviewText:
I bought this just to learn how to play by myself.
I was really surprised when I saw a Music Book inside the package and it really helped me alot to practice.

Very good quality.
reviews.title: Great instrument for beginner
